translations: v．使湿透，浸透：使某物或某人完全湿透。
· The sudden rainstorm drenches the pedestrians.
突然的暴雨把行人淋得湿透。

sentences.sentence: And if any teenagers pass by our driveway, he drenches them.
sentences.translation: 一旦有青少年路过我们家的车道，老爸就把他们泼得浑身湿透。
